name: FLAT SAMURAI
description:
LD38 entry - theme : "Small World"

Welcome to this quick and nervous duel between two flat samurais,

grab your gamepad and slash throught your opponent as the world keeps getting smaller, but take care, the walls will kill you.

2 players local multiplayer game

_______

Controls (Xbox360 gamepad)

Move : Left Joystick

Dash : A Button

Stop : X Button

Change Colour : Y Button

Restart : Back

Relaunch the game : Start

______

Will add sound/music in a week

I hope you'll like it :)
